text:
HappyFunCorp | onsite in NYC | iOS, React, Node, Scala

We're looking for multiple iOS developers, as well as multiple React developers (JSP familiarity a bonus), and server-side developers comfortable with Node / Scala / Java / Oracle / Mongo / Kubernetes / microservices, for on-site work in NYC. (This is a bit unusual for us; most of our work is remote, and it'd be great to use this as an opportunity to establish a relationship for remote work in the future.)

About us: we do web, app, and (some) blockchain development for a panoply of clients ranging from Fortune 500 to brand-new startups. Right now the distribution is roughly 50-50. We prefer people with a reasonable amount of experience under their belt, especially for onsite work. And we pay well. You can reach us at jobs@happyfuncorp.com.
